title: 3 and Out - WFT's Jimmy G Fit, Urban to USC Rumors, Defending Tua, Injury Avalanche, 3 for the $$$, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - WFT's Jimmy G Fit, Urban to USC Rumors, Defending Tua, Injury Avalanche, 3 for the $$$, Mailbag
description:
John breaks down the good and bad from WFT's TNF W over the Giants, and explains why either team would be a good fit for Jimmy Garoppolo. He also discusses Urban Meyer to USC rumors, why it's not fair to put all the blame on Tua if he doesn't live up to NFL expectations, which two teams' seasons are already on the line, why this year's injury avalanche feels worse than most, previews the Week 2 games, runs his 3 for the $Money$ picks by Action Network's Stuckey, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Make sure you follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
